name: BullShielder
description:
Escort the wagon to the end of the stage

[Arrow Keys] - Move
[Space] - Jump and Start the game
[R] - Reset position
[Q] - Restart stage

Music by:

  • rolemu - La Calahorra
  • Komiku - Time to go to space now
  • mathgrant - Arctic Sleet

https://freemusicarchive.org
